body.name: COMMERCIAL CHEF 1.6 Cubic Foot Microwave with 10 Power Levels, Small Microwave with Push Button, 1000 Watt Microwave with Digital Control Panels, Countertop Microwave with Timer, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs
features: Powerful: When it comes to microwave ovens, our COMMERCIAL CHEF 1000 watt microwave (37.3 lbs.) is your solution to fast & delicious food. Microwave bacon, microwave popcorn, & other tasty favorites!
10 Power Levels: Our compact microwave (21.8" x 18.6" x 12.3") has 10 outstanding heating settings, including Speed & Weight Defrost, Cook by Weight, and 6 Preset Menu options.
Digital Control: Heat from 30 seconds to 99 minutes with easy-to-operate digital controls. This countertop microwave has an accurate timer signal when complete. Heat & reheat for the whole family!
Features: When it comes to countertop microwave ovens, our white microwave cooker is 1000 watt with a convenient push button child lock, turntable, & 1.6 cu. ft. capacity.
Grab and Go: This small microwave allows you to heat meals, snacks, and drinks so fast to accommodate your busy life. Our microwave oven helps you can enjoy delicious food without wasting time.

productInformation.name: Model Name
productInformation.value: Countertop Microwave Oven,1000 Watts, Small Compact Size, 10 Power Levels, 6 Easy One Touch Presets with Popcorn Button, Removable Turntable, Child Lock, White

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Quick Cook Settings 6 convenient quick cook settings include popcorn, baked potato, pizza, beverage, reheat and frozen dinners. These preset options prepare these common foods with just one touch of a button. Space Saver Great for a small kitchen or dorm room, this unit provides the benefit of convenient features you would find on a larger microwave without taking up too much counter space. Convenience No need to guess cooking times. Whether you like to settle in with fresh-popped, buttery popcorn before the opening credits, enjoy an easy pizza dinner every once in a while, or want a quick baked potato, you’ll find the ease and speed you’re looking for in the six one-touch quick cook menu buttons.

Features Easy to Read The keypad controls give you the option of inputting precise cooking times, and the LED display lets you clearly see exactly how much time is left. Safety Enjoy the ease of a push button door when you have a plate of food keeping your hands occupied, but rest assured that your children will be safe with the microwave—when activated this unit features a child safety lock. Utility When you can’t wait out frozen vegetables, or you forgot to take that package of chicken out of the freezer early, a microwave can be a lifesaver. Defrost by weight according to the food you need, or use the Speed Defrost feature. This setting works by alternating between defrost and stand times to quickly and effectively defrost foods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars LOUD, and it is not as intuitive as I had hoped.
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the Commercial Chef CHM16100B6C Countertop Microwave Oven,1000 Watts, Small Compact Size.It's big, which I wanted.IT'S LOUD, LOUD, LOUD, which was a surprise.There are no intuitive numbers, for example, with most microwaves if you press the number one, it will start the unit for one minute. This does not do that. However, if you only want 30 seconds, all you have to do is press 30 and start.It seems to do what I need it to do, pop popcorn, reheat food, and cook my vegetables. The spousal unit likes to make microwave eggs, and that seems to work well. Melting cheese is quick, but heating water seems to take a while longer. For two cups it takes four minutes.It has a cord that is almost long enough, almost. Allowances had to be made, but I got it to fit where I needed it to be.PROS: It is a much better unit than the Toshiba ML-EM45PIT(BS) that only lasted for 14 months before it bit the dust, and that was after it had been replaced twice.It holds a large (not x-large) casserole dish, which works for most vegetables.The instructions are easy to understand.It beeps more than once to tell you that your food is ready. That is probably the best thing there is to say about this unit. I don't always hear the first beep.It seems to be heavier & more stable then the Toshiba ML-EM45PIT(BS). That one I could toss around like a rag doll.CONS: It is startlingly loud. You will never be able to make that popcorn without everyone knowing about it.I really wish the cord was just a few inches longer.There are no intuitive numbers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working in just 6 months!
reviews.reviewText: Do not purchase this product! It was a more expensive microwave and stopped working just 6 months after we purchased it—totally quit in the middle of microwaving something! We submitted a claim because it was still under warranty and are STILL waiting 4 months later for a replacement….way too long to receive a new appliance! And, their warranty representatives are horrible—they could never tell us when we would receive the replacement microwave (we are still unsure if and when one is coming). Now, we’re out the money for this microwave (that we STILL haven’t received) and a new microwave we ended up purchasing because we need one for daily use. Save your money and purchase from a different company!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It makes things hot…
reviews.reviewText: …when you can get the door open to put stuff in it. Really crappy microwave but if you can get the door open, it makes things hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great, but boy is it noisy when it starts up. It eventually settles down and becomes quieter as it cooks.
